samples.name: Overview
samples.description: This demo for  Essential JS2 Grid control shows the overview of display and manipulate large data with configuration options to control the way the data is presented and manipulated.

samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid control shows the default rendering of the Grid  control with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Grouping
samples.description: This demo for  Essential JS2 Grid control  demonstrates the grouping feature of the Grid control. The Grid control has options to group the records based on the required column.

samples.description: This demo for  Essential JS2 Grid control demonstrates the visibility of the grid lines that separates the rows and columns.

samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid control shows the usage of the horizontal and vertical scrollbars to view the exceeded grid content.

samples.name: Virtual Scrolling
samples.description: This demo demonstrates how to use Essential JS2 Grid to show large data view without performance degradation by rendering only required rows and columns.
